episodes.title: Mary Cosby’s Cult Scandal | TLC vs Bravo & The Family Secrets REVEALED
episodes.description:
TLC’s explosive new docuseries The Cult of the Real Housewife exposes shocking allegations surrounding The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City star Mary Cosby and the Faith Temple Pentecostal Church. The three-part investigation dives into decades of family drama, lawsuits, and rumors of financial misconduct — and it’s already being called TLC’s biggest challenge to Bravo yet.

This deep dive breaks down the entire story behind The Cult of the Real Housewife — from Rosemary “Mama” Cosby’s legacy and her controversial passing, to the family feud that tore Faith Temple apart, to the recent $6 million lawsuit involving church finances. Viewers will see how TLC is taking direct aim at Bravo, turning one of its most polarizing Housewives into a true-crime headline.

Featuring details about Mary’s marriage to her step-grandfather Robert Cosby Sr., the long-standing disputes over her grandmother’s estate, and interviews with family members like Denise Jefferson Odinaka and Dan Cosby, this video reveals how The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City drama evolved into a national scandal.

The Cult of the Real Housewife premieres January 1 on TLC and streams on Max, promising to unpack “spiritual and financial misconduct” in a way Bravo never has.

Viewers searching for Mary Cosby news, RHOSLC updates, Housewives scandals, or TLC documentary exposés will find every shocking twist here.

00:00 – The Trailer Quote That Shook Bravo
00:58 – TLC vs Bravo | The Reality-TV Rivalry Begins
01:58 – Faith Temple | How Mary Cosby’s Family Built an Empire
02:58 – A Daughter’s Warning | Rosalind Cazares Speaks Out
04:03 – Lawsuits & Legacy | The Fight Over Mama Cosby’s Estate
06:02 – Inside TLC’s Cult of the Real Housewife Docuseries
06:38 – Rosalind’s Final Chapter & The Unfinished Story
07:28 – Mary Cosby and Bravo’s Next Move
